In rare cases, individuals at the mildest end of the condition spectrum have developmental delay in childhood and hearing loss or vision problems beginning in adulthood and do not develop the other features of this disorder.",GHR,Zellweger spectrum disorder
How many people are affected by Zellweger spectrum disorder ?,"Zellweger spectrum disorder is estimated to occur in 1 in 50,000 individuals.",GHR,Zellweger spectrum disorder
